methods.javadoc:
Get the name of this options object.
@return String
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the name of this options object.

return.comment: String

methods.name: getID
methods.comment:
Returns a unique id for option in this options with the given name.  This will be the full
 path name to the root options object.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the option for which to get an ID;

return.comment: the unique ID for the given option.

methods.name: getType
methods.comment: Returns the OptionType of the given option.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the option for which to get the type.

return.comment: the OptionType of option with the given name.

methods.name: getPropertyEditor
methods.comment:
Get the property editor for the option with the given name. Note: This method must be called
 from the swing thread.

return.comment:
either the PropertyEditor that was registered for this option or a default editor
 for the property type if one can be found; otherwise null.

methods.name: getRegisteredPropertyEditor
methods.comment:
Get the property editor that was registered for the specific option with the given name.  Unlike
 the getPropertyEditor() method, this method does not have to be called from the swing thread

return.comment: the PropertyEditor that was registered for this option.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a list of Options objects that are nested one level down from this Options object.
@return a list of Options objects that are nested one level down from this Options object.
methods.name: getChildOptions
methods.comment: Returns a list of Options objects that are nested one level down from this Options object.

return.comment: a list of Options objects that are nested one level down from this Options object.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a list of option names that immediately fall under this options.  For example, if this options
 object had the following options named ("a", "b", "c.d"), only "a" and "b" would be returned.  The
 "c.d" leaf option name could be returned by getOptions("c").getLeafOptionNames()
@return the list of the names of the options that are immediate children of this options object.
methods.name: getLeafOptionNames
methods.comment:
Returns a list of option names that immediately fall under this options.  For example, if this options
 object had the following options named ("a", "b", "c.d"), only "a" and "b" would be returned.  The
 "c.d" leaf option name could be returned by getOptions("c").getLeafOptionNames()

return.comment: the list of the names of the options that are immediate children of this options object.

methods.javadoc:
Set the location for where help can be found for this entire options object.
@param helpLocation location for help on the option
methods.name: setOptionsHelpLocation
methods.comment: Set the location for where help can be found for this entire options object.

params.name: helpLocation
params.comment: location for help on the option

methods.javadoc:
Returns the HelpLocation for this entire Options object.
@return the HelpLocation for this entire Options object.
methods.name: getOptionsHelpLocation
methods.comment: Returns the HelpLocation for this entire Options object.

return.comment: the HelpLocation for this entire Options object.

methods.name: getHelpLocation
methods.comment:
Get the location for where help can be found for the option with
 the given name.

return.comment: null if the help location was not set on the option

methods.name: registerOption
methods.comment:
Registers an option with a description, help location, and a default value without specifying
 the option type.  This form requires that the default value not be null so that the option
 type can be inferred from the default value.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the option being registered.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
the defaultValue for the option. The default value must not be
 null so that the OptionType can be determined.  If the default value should be null, use
 #registerOption(String, OptionType, Object, HelpLocation, String)

methods.name: registerOption
methods.comment:
Registers an option with a description, help location, and a optional default value.  With an optional
 default value, an OptionType must be passed as it is otherwise derived from the default value.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the option being registered.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
the defaultValue for the option. In this version of the method, the default
 value may be null.

methods.name: registerOption
methods.comment:
Registers an option with a description, help location, and a optional default value.  With an optional
 default value, an OptionType must be passed as it is otherwise derived from the default value.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the option being registered.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
the defaultValue for the option. In this version of the method, the default
 value may be null.

params.name: editor
params.comment:
an optional custom editor for this property. Note if the option is a custom option,
 then the property editor can't be null;

methods.name: registerOptionsEditor
methods.comment: Register the options editor that will handle the editing for all the options or a sub group of options.

params.name: editor
params.comment: the custom editor panel to be used to edit the options or sub group of options.

methods.name: getOptionsEditor
methods.comment: Get the editor that will handle editing all the values in this options or sub group of options.

return.comment: null if no options editor was registered

methods.name: putObject
methods.comment:
Put the object value.  If the option exists, the type must match the type of the existing
 object.

methods.name: getObject
methods.comment:
Get the object value; called when the options dialog is being
 populated.

return.comment:
object with the given option name; if no option was found,
 return default value (this value is not stored in the option maps)

methods.name: getBoolean
methods.comment: Get the boolean value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there
 is no option with the given name.

return.comment: boolean option value

methods.name: getByteArray
methods.comment: Get the byte array for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there
 is no option with the given name

return.comment: byte[] byte array value

methods.name: getInt
methods.comment: Get the int value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there
 is no option with the given name

return.comment: int option value

methods.name: getDouble
methods.comment: Get the double value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there
 is no option with the given name

return.comment: double value for the option

methods.name: getFloat
methods.comment: Get the float value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there
 is no option with the given name

return.comment: float value for the option

methods.name: getLong
methods.comment: Get the long value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there
 is no option with the given name

return.comment: long value for the option

methods.name: getCustomOption
methods.comment: Get the custom option value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there
 is no option with the given name

return.comment: WrappedOption value for the option

methods.name: getColor
methods.comment: Get the Color for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there is no
 option with the given name

return.comment: Color option

methods.name: getFile
methods.comment: Get the File for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there is no
 option with the given name

return.comment: File option

methods.name: getDate
methods.comment: Get the Date for the given option name.

return.comment: the Date for the option

methods.name: getFont
methods.comment: Get the Font for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there is no
 option with the given name

return.comment: Font option

methods.name: getKeyStroke
methods.comment: Get the KeyStrokg for the given action name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there is no
 option with the given name

return.comment: KeyStroke option

methods.name: getString
methods.comment: Get the string value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
value that is stored and returned if there is no
 option with the given name

return.comment: String value for the option

methods.name: getEnum
methods.comment: Get the Enum value for the given option name.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
default value that is stored and returned if there is
 no option with the given name

return.comment: Enum value for the option

methods.name: setLong
methods.comment: Sets the long value for the option.

methods.name: setBoolean
methods.comment: Sets the boolean value for the option.

methods.name: setInt
methods.comment: Sets the int value for the option.

methods.name: setDouble
methods.comment: Sets the double value for the option.

methods.name: setFloat
methods.comment: Sets the float value for the option.

methods.name: setCustomOption
methods.comment: Sets the Custom option value for the option.

methods.name: setByteArray
methods.comment: Sets the byte[] value for the given option name.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the option on which to save bytes.

methods.name: setFile
methods.comment: Sets the File value for the option.

methods.name: setDate
methods.comment: Sets the Date value for the option.

methods.name: setColor
methods.comment: Sets the Color value for the option

methods.name: setFont
methods.comment: Sets the Font value for the option

methods.name: setKeyStroke
methods.comment: Sets the KeyStroke value for the option

methods.name: setString
methods.comment: Set the String value for the option.

methods.name: setEnum
methods.comment: Set the Enum value for the option.

methods.javadoc:
Remove the option name.
@param optionName name of option to remove
methods.name: removeOption
methods.comment: Remove the option name.

methods.javadoc:
Get the list of option names. This method will return the names (paths) of all options contained
 in this options object or below.  For example, if the options has ("aaa", "bbb", "ccc.ddd"), 
 all three will be returned.  the {@link Options#getLeafOptionNames()} method will return only
 the "aaa" and "bbb" names.
@return the list of all option names(paths) under this options.
methods.name: getOptionNames
methods.comment:
Get the list of option names. This method will return the names (paths) of all options contained
 in this options object or below.  For example, if the options has ("aaa", "bbb", "ccc.ddd"), 
 all three will be returned.  the Options#getLeafOptionNames() method will return only
 the "aaa" and "bbb" names.

return.comment: the list of all option names(paths) under this options.

methods.javadoc:
Return true if a option exists with the given name.
@param optionName option name
methods.name: contains
methods.comment: Return true if a option exists with the given name.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Get the description for the given option name.

return.comment: null if the description or option name does not exist

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if the specified option has been registered.  Only registered names
 are saved.
methods.name: isRegistered
methods.comment:
Returns true if the specified option has been registered.  Only registered names
 are saved.

methods.name: isDefaultValue
methods.comment: Returns true if the option with the given name's current value is the default value.

return.comment: true if the options has its current value equal to its default value.

methods.javadoc: Restores all options contained herein to their default values. @see #restoreDefaultValue(String)
methods.name: restoreDefaultValues
methods.comment: Restores all options contained herein to their default values.

methods.name: restoreDefaultValue
methods.comment: Restores the option denoted by the given name to its default value.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: The name of the option to restore

methods.name: getOptions
methods.comment: Returns a Options object that is a sub-options of this options.

params.name: path
params.comment: the path for the sub-options object.

return.comment: a Options object that is a sub-options of this options.

methods.name: createAlias
methods.comment: Create an alias in this options for an existing option in some other options object.

params.name: aliasName
params.comment: the name within this options object that will acutally refer to some other options object.

params.name: options
params.comment: the options object that has the actual option.

params.name: optionsName
params.comment: the name within the given options object of the actual option.

methods.name: isAlias
methods.comment: Returns

return.comment: a Options object that is a sub-options of this options.

methods.name: getDefaultValue
methods.comment: Returns the default value for the given option.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the option for which to retrieve the default value.

return.comment: the default value for the given option.

methods.name: getValueAsString
methods.comment: Returns the value as a string for the given option.

return.comment: the value as a string for the given option.

methods.name: getDefaultValueAsString
methods.comment: Returns the default value as a string for the given option.

return.comment: the default value as a string for the given option.
